sources.title: 1938 Rote Orchideen ( Olga Tschechowa, Camilla Horn, Albrecht Schönhals, Herbert Hübner, Hans Nielsen, Walter Steinbeck)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938. Rote Orchideen.  Olga Tschechowa und Albrecht Schönhals

metadata.Plot: A draftsman is accused of selling industry state secrets to a foreign agent and must also save the life of a fellow engineer sentenced for espionage.
metadata.Writer: Philipp Lothar Mayring, Kurt Heuser, Harald G. Petersson
metadata.Actors: Olga Tschechowa, Camilla Horn, Albrecht Schoenhals
